title: The Life & Loves of Elizabeth Taylor | “Mike’s Dead and I’m Alive” | 2
description:
In 1958, Elizabeth Taylor loses the life of her life. The entire world mourns with her; her grief is their grief. She's the most beloved woman in America. Six months later, she’s the most hated. So what happened? Two words: Eddie Fisher.
